instanceCount.description: The number of app server instances.

ApplicationServerConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the application server configuration.

availabilitySetName.description: The full name for availability set. In case name is not provided, it will be defaulted to {SID}-App-AvSet.

virtualMachines.description: The list of virtual machine naming details.

ApplicationServerFullResourceNames.description: The full resource names object for application layer resources. The number of entries in this list should be equal to the number VMs to be created for application layer.

instantRpRetentionRangeInDays.description: Instant RP retention policy range in days

protectedItemsCount.description: Number of items associated with this policy.

tieringPolicy.description:
Tiering policy to automatically move RPs to another tier
Key is Target Tier, defined in RecoveryPointTierType enum.
Tiering policy specifies the criteria to move RP to the target tier.

timeZone.description: Time zone optional input as string. For example: "Pacific Standard Time".

protectedItemsCount.description: Number of items associated with this policy.

settings.description: Common settings field for backup management

subProtectionPolicy.description: List of sub-protection policies which includes schedule and retention

workLoadType.description: Type of workload for the backup management.

recoveryServicesVault.description: The properties of the recovery services vault used for backup.

BackupData.description: Information about the recovery services vault and backup policy used for backup.

instanceCount.description: The number of central server VMs.

CentralServerConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the central server configuration.

availabilitySetName.description: The full name for availability set. In case name is not provided, it will be defaulted to {SID}-ASCS-AvSet.

loadBalancer.description: The resource names object for load balancer and related resources.

virtualMachines.description: The list of names for all ASCS virtual machines to be deployed. The number of entries in this list should be equal to the number VMs to be created for ASCS layer. At maximum, there can be two virtual machines at this layer: ASCS and ERS.

CentralServerFullResourceNames.description: The full resource names object for central server layer resources.

sourceResourceId.description: Defines the ID of the connector's source resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: The name of the backup connection resource of virtual instance for SAP.

properties.description: Defines the backup connection properties for a virtual instance for SAP.

resourceGroup.description: The name of transport file share resource group. This should be pre created by the customer. The app rg is used in case of missing input.

storageAccountName.description: The name of file share storage account name . A custom name is used in case of missing input.

CreateAndMountFileShareConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the file share configuration where the transport directory fileshare is created and mounted as a part of the create infra flow. Please pre-create the resource group you intend to place the transport directory in. The storage account and fileshare will be auto-created by the ACSS and doesn't need to be pre-created.

daysOfTheMonth.description: List of days of the month.

scheduleRunTimes.description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

DatabaseConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the database configuration.

availabilitySetName.description: The full name for availability set. In case name is not provided, it will be defaulted to {SID}-DB-AvSet.

loadBalancer.description: The resource names object for load balancer and related resources.

virtualMachines.description: The list of virtual machine naming details.

DatabaseServerFullResourceNames.description: The full resource names object for database layer resources. The number of entries in this list should be equal to the number VMs to be created for database layer.

isLast.description: Whether Date is last date of month

name.description: The name of the DB backup policy.

DBBackupPolicyProperties.description: Defines the policy properties for database backup.

storageAccountId.description: The deployer VM packages storage account id

url.description: The URL to the deployer VM packages file.

DeployerVmPackages.description: Defines the url and storage account ID where deployer VM packages are uploaded

appLocation.description: The geo-location where the SAP system is to be created.
The geo-location where the SAP system is to be created.

osSapConfiguration.description: Defines the OS and SAP Configurations for Deployment

centralServerVmId.description: The virtual machine ID of the Central Server.

managedRgStorageAccountName.description:
The custom storage account name for the storage account created by the service in the managed resource group created as part of VIS deployment.

Refer to the storage account naming rules [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/azure-resource-manager/management/resource-name-rules#microsoftstorage).

If not provided, the service will create the storage account with a random name.

diskVolumeConfigurations.description: The disk configuration for the db volume. For HANA, Required volumes are: ['hana/data', 'hana/log', hana/shared', 'usr/sap', 'os'], Optional volume : ['backup'].

diskLunList.description: List of Disks' Logical Unit Numbers (LUN) to be used for VM Protection.

isInclusionList.description: Flag to indicate whether DiskLunList is to be included/ excluded from backup.

DiskExclusionProperties.description: Defines the disk exclusion properties for virtual machine backup.

DiskSku.description: The type of disk sku. For example, Standard_LRS, Standard_ZRS, Premium_LRS, Premium_ZRS.

count.description: The total number of disks required for the concerned volume.

sku.description: The type of disk sku. For example, Standard_LRS, Standard_ZRS, Premium_LRS, Premium_ZRS.

DiskVolumeConfiguration.description: The disk configuration required for the selected volume.

EnqueueReplicationServerProperties.description: Defines the SAP Enqueue Replication Server (ERS) properties.

EnqueueServerProperties.description: Defines the SAP Enqueue Server properties.

id.description: The resource ID of the recovery services vault that has been created.

centralServerVmId.description: The resource ID of the virtual machine containing the central server instance.

ExternalInstallationSoftwareConfiguratio.description: The SAP Software configuration Input when the software is installed externally outside the service.

FileShareConfiguration.description: File Share configuration details, populated with information on storage configuration mounted on the VIS. The createAndMount option is selected in case of missing input.

GatewayServerProperties.description: Defines the SAP Gateway Server properties.

backupPolicy.description: Defines the policy properties for database backup.

dbInstanceSnapshotBackupPolicy.description: Defines the policy properties for database backup.

hdbuserstoreKeyName.description: Name of the HANA Database User Store Key.

instanceNumber.description: Gets or sets the database instance number.

sslConfiguration.description: Specify the HANA database TLS/SSL properties which will be used for enabling Azure Backup for this database. You need to specify these details if you have enabled secure communication for your HANA database.

HanaBackupData.description: Defines the HANA Backup data for a virtual instance for SAP.

HighAvailabilityConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the high availability configuration.

fencingClientPassword.description: The fencing client id secret/password. The secret should never expire. This will be used pacemaker to start/stop the cluster VMs.

HighAvailabilitySoftwareConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the HA software configuration.

interval.description:
Interval at which backup needs to be triggered. For hourly the value
 can be 4/6/8/12

scheduleWindowDuration.description: To specify duration of the backup window

scheduleWindowStartTime.description: To specify start time of the backup window

id.description: Specifies the ARM resource ID of the Azure Compute Gallery image version used for creating ACSS VMs. You will need to provide this input when you choose to deploy virtual machines in ACSS with OS image from the Azure Compute gallery.

offer.description: Specifies the offer of the platform image or marketplace image used to create the virtual machine.

version.description: Specifies the version of the platform image or marketplace image used to create the virtual machine. The allowed formats are Major.Minor.Build or 'latest'. Major, Minor, and Build are decimal numbers. Specify 'latest' to use the latest version of an image available at deploy time. Even if you use 'latest', the VM image will not automatically update after deploy time even if a new version becomes available.

ImageReference.description: Specifies information about the image to use. You can specify information about platform images, marketplace images, or virtual machine images. This element is required when you want to use a platform image, marketplace image, or virtual machine image, but is not used in other creation operations. NOTE: Image reference publisher and offer can only be set when you create the scale set.

appResourceGroup.description: The application resource group where SAP system resources will be deployed.

azureBackupRGNamePrefix.description: Azure backup resource group name prefix.

azureBackupRGNameSuffix.description: Azure backup resource group name suffix.

disablePasswordAuthentication.description: Specifies whether password authentication should be disabled.

ssh.description: SSH configuration for Linux based VMs running on Azure

sshKeyPair.description:
The SSH Key-pair used to authenticate with the VM. The key needs to be at least 2048-bit and in ssh-rsa format.

For creating ssh keys, see [Create SSH keys on Linux and Mac for Linux VMs in Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/linux/create-ssh-keys-detailed).

LinuxConfiguration.description:
Specifies the Linux operating system settings on the virtual machine.

For a list of supported Linux distributions, see [Linux on Azure-Endorsed Distributions](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/linux/endorsed-distros).

backendPoolNames.description: The list of backend pool names. Currently, ACSS deploys only one backend pool and hence, size of this list should be 1

frontendIpConfigurationNames.description: The list of frontend IP configuration names. If provided as input, size of this list should be 2 for cs layer and should be 1 for database layer.

healthProbeNames.description: The list of health probe names. If provided as input, size of this list should be 2 for cs layer and should be 1 for database layer.

loadBalancerName.description: The full resource name for load balancer. If this value is not provided, load balancer will be name as {ASCS/DB}-loadBalancer.

LoadBalancerResourceNames.description: The resource names object for load balancer and related resources.

scheduleFrequencyInMins.description: Frequency of the log schedule operation of this policy in minutes.

MessageServerProperties.description: Defines the SAP message server properties.

retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format type for monthly retention policy.

MountFileShareConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the file share configuration where the transport directory fileshare already exists, and user wishes to mount the fileshare as a part of the create infra flow.

isSecondaryIpEnabled.description: Specifies whether a secondary IP address should be added to the network interface on all VMs of the SAP system being deployed

NetworkConfiguration.description: Defines the network configuration type for SAP system infrastructure that is being deployed

networkInterfaceName.description: The full name for network interface. If name is not provided, service uses a default name based on the deployment type. For SingleServer, default name is {SID}-Nic. In case of HA-AvZone systems, default name will be {SID}-{App/ASCS/DB}-Zone{A/B}-Nic with an incrementor at the end in case of more than 1 instance per layer. For distributed and HA-AvSet systems, default name will be {SID}-{App/ASCS/DB}-Nic with an incrementor at the end in case of more than 1 instance per layer.

NetworkInterfaceResourceNames.description: The resource names object for network interface and related resources.

name.description: The name of the recovery services vault has to be created.

resourceGroup.description: The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault has to be created.

adminPassword.description:
Specifies the password of the administrator account.

**Minimum-length (Windows):** 8 characters

**Minimum-length (Linux):** 6 characters

**Max-length (Windows):** 123 characters

**Max-length (Linux):** 72 characters

**Complexity requirements:** 3 out of 4 conditions below need to be fulfilled
Has lower characters
Has upper characters
Has a digit
Has a special character (Regex match [\W_])

**Disallowed values:** "abc@123", "P@$$w0rd", "P@ssw0rd", "P@ssword123", "Pa$$word", "pass@word1", "Password!", "Password1", "Password22", "iloveyou!"

For resetting the password, see [How to reset the Remote Desktop service or its login password in a Windows VM](https://docs.microsoft.com/troubleshoot/azure/virtual-machines/reset-rdp)

For resetting root password, see [Manage users, SSH, and check or repair disks on Azure Linux VMs using the VMAccess Extension](https://docs.microsoft.com/troubleshoot/azure/virtual-machines/troubleshoot-ssh-connection)

adminUsername.description:
Specifies the name of the administrator account.

This property cannot be updated after the VM is created.

**Windows-only restriction:** Cannot end in "."

**Disallowed values:** "administrator", "admin", "user", "user1", "test", "user2", "test1", "user3", "admin1", "1", "123", "a", "actuser", "adm", "admin2", "aspnet", "backup", "console", "david", "guest", "john", "owner", "root", "server", "sql", "support", "support_388945a0", "sys", "test2", "test3", "user4", "user5".

**Minimum-length (Linux):** 1 character

**Max-length (Linux):** 64 characters

**Max-length (Windows):** 20 characters.

OSProfile.description: Specifies the operating system settings for the virtual machine. Some of the settings cannot be changed once VM is provisioned.

deployerVmPackages.description: Defines the url and storage account ID where deployer VM packages are uploaded

sapFqdn.description: The FQDN to set for the SAP system

OsSapConfiguration.description: Defines the OS and SAP Configurations for Deployment

RecoveryServicesVaultProperties.description: The properties of the recovery services vault used for backup.

count.description:
Count of duration types. Retention duration is obtained by the counting the duration type Count times.
For example, when Count = 3 and DurationType = Weeks, retention duration will be three weeks.

durationType.description: Retention duration type of retention policy.

SAPApplicationServerProperties.description: Defines the SAP Application Server instance properties.

enqueueReplicationServerProperties.description: Defines the SAP Enqueue Replication Server (ERS) properties.

enqueueServerProperties.description: Defines the SAP Enqueue Server properties.

gatewayServerProperties.description: Defines the SAP Gateway Server properties.

messageServerProperties.description: Defines the SAP message server properties.

SAPCentralServerProperties.description: Defines the SAP Central Services Instance properties.

bomUrl.description: The URL to the SAP Build of Materials(BOM) file.

highAvailabilitySoftwareConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the HA software configuration.

sapBitsStorageAccountId.description: The SAP bits storage account id.

SAPInstallWithoutOSConfigSoftwareConfigu.description: The SAP Software configuration Input when the software is to be installed by service without OS Configurations

managedResourcesNetworkAccessType.description: Specifies the network access configuration for the resources that will be deployed in the Managed Resource Group. The options to choose from are Public and Private. If 'Private' is chosen, the Storage Account service tag should be enabled on the subnets in which the SAP VMs exist. This is required for establishing connectivity between VM extensions and the managed resource group storage account. This setting is currently applicable only to Storage Account. Learn more here https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2247228.

SAPVirtualInstanceProperties.description: Defines the Virtual Instance for SAP solutions resource properties.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: The name of SAP Application Server instance resource.

properties.description: Defines the SAP Application Server instance properties.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: Central Services Instance resource name string modeled as parameter for auto generation to work correctly.

properties.description: Defines the SAP Central Services Instance properties.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: Database resource name string modeled as parameter for auto generation to work correctly.

bomUrl.description: The URL to the SAP Build of Materials(BOM) file.

highAvailabilitySoftwareConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the HA software configuration.

sapBitsStorageAccountId.description: The SAP bits storage account id.

sapFqdn.description: The FQDN to set for the SAP system during install.

ServiceInitiatedSoftwareConfiguration.description: The SAP Software configuration Input when the software is to be installed by service.

isCompression.description:
Workload compression flag. This has been added so that 'isSqlCompression'
will be deprecated once clients upgrade to consider this flag.

timeZone.description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

Settings.description: Common settings field for backup management

sharedStorageAccountName.description: The full name of the shared storage account. If it is not provided, it will be defaulted to {SID}nfs{guid of 15 chars}.

sharedStorageAccountPrivateEndPointName.description: The full name of private end point for the shared storage account. If it is not provided, it will be defaulted to {storageAccountName}_pe

SharedStorageResourceNames.description: The resource names object for shared storage.

scheduleRunDays.description: List of days of week this schedule has to be run.

scheduleRunFrequency.description: Frequency of the schedule operation of this policy.

scheduleRunTimes.description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

scheduleWeeklyFrequency.description: At every number weeks this schedule has to be run.

scheduleRunFrequency.description: Frequency of the schedule operation of this policy.

SimpleSchedulePolicyV2.description: The V2 policy schedule for IaaS that supports hourly backups.

customResourceNames.description: The resource-names input to specify custom names for underlying azure resources that are part of a single server SAP system.

networkConfiguration.description: Defines the network configuration type for SAP system infrastructure that is being deployed

SingleServerConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the single server configuration. For prerequisites for creating the infrastructure, please see [here](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2212611&clcid=0x409)

SingleServerCustomResourceNames.description: The resource-names input to specify custom names for underlying azure resources that are part of a single server SAP system.

virtualMachine.description: The resource names object for virtual machine and related resources.

SingleServerFullResourceNames.description: The resource name object where the specified values will be full resource names of the corresponding resources in a single server SAP system.

SkipFileShareConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the file share configuration for scenarios where transport directory fileshare is not created or required.

instantRPDetails.description: Instant RP details for the snapshot.

instantRpRetentionRangeInDays.description: Retention range for instant Rp in days.

SnapshotBackupAdditionalDetails.description: Snapshot Backup related fields for WorkloadType SAP Hana system

backupPolicy.description: Defines the policy properties for database backup.

SqlBackupData.description: Defines the SQL Backup data for a virtual instance for SAP.

publicKeys.description: The list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with linux based VMs.

SshConfiguration.description: SSH configuration for Linux based VMs running on Azure

SshKeyPair.description:
The SSH Key-pair used to authenticate with the VM. The key needs to be at least 2048-bit and in ssh-rsa format.

For creating ssh keys, see [Create SSH keys on Linux and Mac for Linux VMs in Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/linux/create-ssh-keys-detailed).

keyData.description:
SSH public key certificate used to authenticate with the VM through ssh. The key needs to be at least 2048-bit and in ssh-rsa format.

For creating ssh keys, see [Create SSH keys on Linux and Mac for Linux VMs in Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/linux/create-ssh-keys-detailed).

SshPublicKey.description: Contains information about SSH certificate public key and the path on the Linux VM where the public key is placed.

sslCryptoProvider.description: Specify the crypto provider being used (commoncrypto/openssl). If this argument is not provided, it is automatically determined by searching in the configuration files.

sslHostNameInCertificate.description: Specify the hostname as mentioned in the SSL certificate. If this argument is not provided, it is automatically determined by searching in the SSL certificate.

sslKeyStore.description: Specify the name of the keystore file that contains the client's identity (eg. sapsrv.pse). The script will search for the file in the appropriate directory depending on the crypto provider mentioned. If this argument is not provided, it is automatically determined by searching in the configuration files.

sslTrustStore.description: Specify the name of the trust store file that contains the servers public certificates (eg. sapsrv.pse). The script will search for the file in the appropriate directory depending on the crypto provider mentioned. If this argument is not provided, it is automatically determined by searching in the configuration files.

SSLConfiguration.description: Specify the HANA database TLS/SSL properties which will be used for enabling Azure Backup for this database. You need to specify these details if you have enabled secure communication for your HANA database.

transportFileShareConfiguration.description: File Share configuration details, populated with information on storage configuration mounted on the VIS. The createAndMount option is selected in case of missing input.

StorageConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the storage configuration.

snapshotBackupAdditionalDetails.description: Snapshot Backup related fields for WorkloadType SAP Hana system

tieringPolicy.description:
Tiering policy to automatically move RPs to another tier.
Key is Target Tier, defined in RecoveryPointTierType enum.
Tiering policy specifies the criteria to move RP to the target tier.

SubProtectionPolicy.description: Sub-protection policy which includes schedule and retention

applicationServer.description: Gets or sets the application server configuration.

centralServer.description: Gets or sets the central server configuration.

customResourceNames.description: The resource-names input to specify custom names for underlying azure resources that are part of a three tier SAP system.

databaseServer.description: Gets or sets the database configuration.

highAvailabilityConfig.description: Gets or sets the high availability configuration.

networkConfiguration.description: Defines the network configuration type for SAP system infrastructure that is being deployed

storageConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the storage configuration.

ThreeTierConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the three tier SAP configuration. For prerequisites for creating the infrastructure, please see [here](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2212611&clcid=0x409)

ThreeTierCustomResourceNames.description: The resource-names input to specify custom names for underlying azure resources that are part of a three tier SAP system.

applicationServer.description: The full resource names object for application layer resources. The number of entries in this list should be equal to the number VMs to be created for application layer.

centralServer.description: The full resource names object for central server layer resources.

databaseServer.description: The full resource names object for database layer resources. The number of entries in this list should be equal to the number VMs to be created for database layer.

sharedStorage.description: The resource names object for shared storage.

ThreeTierFullResourceNames.description: The resource name object where the specified values will be full resource names of the corresponding resources in a three tier SAP system.

duration.description:
Number of days/weeks/months/years to retain backups in current tier before tiering.
Used only if TieringMode is set to TierAfter

durationType.description:
Retention duration type: days/weeks/months/years
Used only if TieringMode is set to TierAfter.

tieringMode.description:
Tiering Mode to control automatic tiering of recovery points. Supported values are:
1. TierRecommended: Tier all recovery points recommended to be tiered
2. TierAfter: Tier all recovery points after a fixed period, as specified in duration + durationType below.
3. DoNotTier: Do not tier any recovery points.

TieringPolicy.description:
Tiering Policy for a target tier.
If the policy is not specified for a given target tier, service retains the existing configured tiering policy for that tier

userAssignedIdentities.description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

imageReference.description: Specifies information about the image to use. You can specify information about platform images, marketplace images, or virtual machine images. This element is required when you want to use a platform image, marketplace image, or virtual machine image, but is not used in other creation operations. NOTE: Image reference publisher and offer can only be set when you create the scale set.

osProfile.description: Specifies the operating system settings for the virtual machine. Some of the settings cannot be changed once VM is provisioned.

dataDiskNames.description: The full resource names for virtual machine data disks. This is a dictionary containing list of names of data disks per volume. Currently supported volumes for database layer are ['hana/data', 'hana/log', hana/shared', 'usr/sap', 'os', 'backup']. For application and cs layers, only 'default' volume is supported

hostName.description: The full name for virtual-machine's host (computer name). Currently, ACSS only supports host names which are less than or equal to 13 characters long. If this value is not provided, vmName will be used as host name.

networkInterfaces.description: The list of network interface name objects for the selected virtual machine. Currently, only one network interface is supported per virtual machine.

osDiskName.description: The full name for OS disk attached to the VM. If this value is not provided, it will be named by ARM as per its default naming standards (prefixed with vm name). There is only one OS disk attached per Virtual Machine.

vmName.description: The full name for virtual machine. The length of this field can be upto 64 characters. If name is not provided, service uses a default name based on the deployment type. For SingleServer, default name is {SID}vm. In case of HA-AvZone systems, default name will be {SID}{app/ascs/db}z{a/b}vm with an incrementor at the end in case of more than 1 vm per layer. For distributed and HA-AvSet systems, default name will be {SID}{app/ascs/db}vm with an incrementor at the end in case of more than 1 vm per layer.

VirtualMachineResourceNames.description: The resource names object for virtual machine and related resources.

backupPolicy.description: Defines the policy properties for virtual machine backup.

diskExclusionProperties.description: Defines the disk exclusion properties for virtual machine backup.

VMBackupData.description: Defines the VM Backup data for a virtual instance for SAP.

name.description: The name of the VM Backup policy.

VMBackupPolicyProperties.description: Defines the policy properties for virtual machine backup.

daysOfTheWeek.description: List of days of the week.
List of days of week for weekly retention policy.

scheduleRunTimes.description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

WindowsConfiguration.description: Specifies Windows operating system settings on the virtual machine.

monthsOfYear.description: List of months of year of yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format for yearly retention policy.
